babble.net.http

Class HttpRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • babble.net.http.HttpRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Route<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>, CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultGet

    public abstract class HttpRoute
extends Object
implements Route<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
    An HTTP route processes a request to generate a response. The request is often processed in a separate thread. A route is specified by a method and an URL pattern.
    Author:
    pinaki poddar

      Create a request to handle given given HTTP method at any path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRoute

        protected HttpRoute(String method)
        Create a request to handle given given HTTP method at any path.
        Parameters:
        method - one of HTTP method name e.g. 'GET', 'POST', PUT etc.

      • HttpRoute

        protected HttpRoute(String method,
                    String pattern)
        Create a request to handle given given HTTP method at given path.
        Parameters:
        method - one of HTTP method name e.g. 'GET', 'POST', PUT etc.
        pattern - a regular expression pattern. If a request URI path matches the given pattern, then this route will be invoked to handle the request. A null pattern matches any path. The pattern follows Java regular expression syntax. For example, regular expression to match any path is .*.

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        public final String getMethod()
        Gets the method to be invoked by this request.

      • getMatchingPattern

        public final String getMatchingPattern()
        Gets the regular expression to match request path
        Returns:
        can be null to indicate that all paths match.

      • matches

        public final boolean matches(HttpRequest request)
        Affirms if the given method and path matches the method and pattern of this route.
        Specified by:
        matches in interface Route<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
        Returns:
        true if the request matches this route
